thread.title: Mariana Borges
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by Mariana Borges

author: Mariana Borges
title: Mariana Borges
text:
I'm new to the process and it was a tiring and endless one. Still I got all the support I needed and multiple times I had people calling me and emailing me to make sure everything was according to the specifications just so I could have the best results.
I ordered a single CD for a special gift and I'd definitely use Disc Makers again, on whatever services they offer, because it's all done with excellence. Also, the CD was delivered before I expected. Amazing company to work with!
